thread.title: Twitter Is Roasting CeeLo Green's Bizarre Gold Grammys Outfit
thread.title_full: Twitter Is Roasting CeeLo Green's Bizarre Gold Grammys Outfit

author: Zakk Feig
title: Twitter Is Roasting CeeLo Green's Bizarre Gold Grammys Outfit
text:
Home > Music > Twitter Is Roasting CeeLo Green's Bizarre Gold Grammys Outfit Twitter Is Roasting CeeLo Green's Bizarre Gold Grammys Outfit 0 0 Posted by Zakk Feig , Feb 13, 2017 at 03:44am CeeLo Green presented himself as a sacrifice to the Twitter gods. 
In case you missed it, CeeLo Green pulled up to the Grammys in the strangest outfit in recent memory, a head-to-toe golden do resembling some sort of super villain. FYI: CeeLo Green will be going by CeeLo Gold tonight at the #GRAMMYs . pic.twitter.com/WjD7yn2dh6 â€” E! Style (@EOnlineStyle) February 13, 2017 
As you can probably imagine, Twitter didn't miss a beat, and CeeLo's fashion decision became the roast of the evening. Take in some select savage tweets below. why is cee lo green out there looking like a ferrero rocher? #GRAMMYs pic.twitter.com/ujcMxpOUzY
